data.message:
I have something to tell you, to write
A bad for a good, you know the principle
Reveal this flame that is in you, for even if you were born of darkness, you do not belong to them. Remember, you have become a fighter to come out of nothingness. Do not become what fuels you, get out of this context.
- Eve close your fucking mouth
"If I did, who would I be?" Just my shadow
Dear angel, please, Marshall and his rhyme of phenomenal, remember you
Your performance on stage, your light, does not let go !!!

replies.message:
Oh oh, an unhappy ah ah
Come on !!!
